#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define endl "\n"
#define mp make_pair
#define X first
#define Y second
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
typedef long long int lli;
int main()
{
    char s[1009];
    int T,l,a,sum;
    cin>>T;
    while(T--)
    {
        cin>>s;sum=0;
        l=strlen(s);
        FOR(i,0,l-1)
        {
            a=s[i]-'0';
            if(a>0 && a<=9)
                sum+=a;
        }
        cout<<sum<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
